verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The world may fade
You will remain
In the midst of the trial
You will always be, I'll sing
Our God never fails
Our God never fails

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
With hope and light
You reign over all
Though my heart may fail
You will always be, I'll sing
Our God never fails
Our God never fails

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
Praise in the morning
Praise in the evening
Praise when I'm laughing
Praise when I'm grieving
There will be dancing
There will be singing
Upon injustice we will tell of our God

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
The hope of all hearts
The hope of all hearts Is you
Your love never fails
Your love never fails
